channel.title: I have frame for music but music won't play on modified clients!
channel.description: Well is there anyway to fix this? I finally found frame, but for some reason music doesn't play on deobbed clients even on real rs, only if i use the applet on runescape.com, please post if you know how to fix thanks.

item.title: I have frame for music but music won't play on modified clients!
item.dc:creator: @xerozcheez xerozcheez
item.description:
@xerozcheez wrote:

Lol the music are in bytes or w/e, I can still play the loading music using a midi player I got from the sun site though, although I’ve released a client with that a month ago XD

Read full topic
